headline: Is It Time To Revisit Copart (CPRT) After Its 28% One Year Share Price Decline?
summary: Wondering if Copart is attractively priced right now, or if the recent share moves are masking what it is really worth? Copart's share price recently closed at US$39.83, with returns of 5.5% over the last week, 3.0% over the last 30 days, 5.5% year to date, a 28.4% decline over the past year, and gains of 26.8% and 37.6% over the last 3 and 5 years, respectively. These mixed returns have kept Copart on many investors' watchlists, as shorter term gains sit alongside that 1 year decline. In...
